DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY FOCUS : SANTA ANA ; BOND SALE TO FUND CITY WATER_PROJECTS
DOC.TEXT: The City_Council has approved the sale of bonds worth $ 24 million to fund future water_system improvements . The council unanimously approved the sale without comment at its regular meeting Monday . The 30-year bonds will be used to pay_for several water delivery projects , including replacement and expansion of the Garthe Reservoir , and the replacement of water_mains along First Street . Those projects should be completed by August , 1997 , according to a staff report . Interest on the bonds is expected to be no more_than 6.5 % and they are expected to be issued by August , the report stated . JON NALICK
